static_features: A man with a strong, weathered face and deep brown eyes. He possesses an air of authority.
dynamic_features: Wearing a silver-threaded Crown of Sevens; dressed in practical armor.

static_features: A beautiful woman with olive skin and amber eyes. Resilient in appearance.
dynamic_features: Visibly pregnant in the opening scene; later wears dark, practical peasant garb.

static_features: Devastatingly beautiful real human woman, appears early 40s. Porcelain-pale skin with natural texture. Large dark nearly-black eyes with no warmth. High sharp cheekbones. Full crimson lips. Long straight raven-black hair falling heavy like a curtain. Tall, slender. Her beauty is unsettling — the kind that makes you uneasy. Real skin, real actress, NOT CGI.
dynamic_features: Wears a fitted black gown with high structured collar embroidered with dark crimson thread. A thin crown of black iron thorns after the coup. Long black gloves. A blood-red jewel hangs on a gold chain around her neck as a NECKLACE — NOT embedded in skin. Voice: silky, soft, almost musical.

static_features: A scarred Knight with a sturdy build. Gruff in demeanor.
dynamic_features: Wears armor that becomes scratched and muddied.

static_features: A real human young woman of 18. Striking — she has her mother's amber eyes and her father's strong jaw. Wild untamed dark auburn hair. Sun-freckled skin from living outdoors. Lean athletic build from years of farm work. She doesn't know she's beautiful. Real skin with freckles and imperfections, NOT a model. She looks like a farmhand, not a princess.
dynamic_features: Wears a simple rough-spun peasant dress in earthy brown, a worn leather belt, simple sandals. NO props on her body, NO wooden items, NO armor, NO accessories except a faded cloth wrapped around her wrist. Just a simple village girl. When powers manifest, her amber eyes glow faintly golden.
